thread.title: 'Bigg Boss 9': Vikas Bhalla breaks down on reading his wife's letter
thread.title_full: 'Bigg Boss 9': Vikas Bhalla breaks down on reading his wife's letter - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Bigg Boss 9': Vikas Bhalla breaks down on reading his wife's letter
text:
Vikas Bhalla turned a year older in the Bigg Boss house. While the housemates forgot his birthday, Salman Khan reminded everyone about it.*Vikas Bhalla reads his wife's letter*
Vikas' wife Punita Chopra sent a birthday card and a letter for him. Vikas broke down after reading the letter.*Vikas Bhalla breaks down after reading ... Â»
